column4: Hi guys, I have a question - After Ubuntu 11.04 will the Ubuntu OS drop the GNOME enviorment and completley replace it with UNITY?
Oh alright, because I honestly just can not get used to UNITY, it is more of a netbook release then a desktop in my oppnion
unity is the default desktop from now on
use what you want, this is not a poll place; and gnome was not taked down :S
